keywords: ['metal', 'wide aggressive electric guitar chords', 'repetitive aggressive male vocals', 'screaming', 'distorted bass guitar', 'punchy snare', 'wide toms roll', 'energetic cymbals', 'aggressive', 'energetic', 'manic', 'punchy kick']
caption: The Metal song features a repetitive, aggressive male vocal screaming over wide, aggressive electric guitar chords, distorted bass guitar, punchy snare and kick hits and energetic cymbals. There is a toms roll at the end of the loop. It sounds aggressive, energetic and manic - like something you would jump into a mosh pit at the concert.
